name: Vehicle
description: Base class for all Vehicle entities.

functions.name: AddSkeletalMeshAttached
functions.description: Attaches a Skeletal Mesh as master pose to this entity
functions.description_long: Spawns and attaches a SkeletalMesh to this Pickable, the SkeletalMesh must have the same skeleton used by this Actor's mesh, and will follow all animations from it. Uses a custom ID to be used for removing/customizing it afterwards

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Used further for removing or applying material settings on it

parameters.name: skeletal_mesh_path
parameters.description: Path to SkeletalMesh asset to attach

parameters.name: use_parent_bounds
parameters.description: If true, this component uses its parents bounds when attached. This can be a significant optimization with many components attached together

functions.name: AddStaticMeshAttached
functions.description: Attaches a Static Mesh to this entity
functions.description_long: Spawns and attaches a StaticMesh to this Pickable in a Socket with a relative location and rotation. Uses a custom ID to be used for removing/customizing it afterwards

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique ID to assign to the StaticMesh

parameters.name: static_mesh_path
parameters.description: Path to StaticMesh asset to attach

parameters.name: socket
parameters.description: Bone socket to attach to

parameters.name: relative_location
parameters.description: Relative location

parameters.name: relative_rotation
parameters.description: Relative rotation

parameters.name: use_parent_bounds
parameters.description: If true, this component uses its parents bounds when attached. This can be a significant optimization with many components attached together

functions.name: GetAllStaticMeshAttached
functions.description: Gets all Static Meshes attached to this entity

return.description: the key as the Attached ID, and the value as the Asset Path

functions.name: GetAllSkeletalMeshAttached
functions.description: Gets all Skeletal Meshes attached to this entity

return.description: the key as the Attached ID, and the value as the Asset Path

functions.name: RemoveSkeletalMeshAttached
functions.description: Removes, if it exists, a SkeletalMesh from this Pickable given its custom ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the SkeletalMesh to remove

functions.name: SetStaticMeshAttachedTransform
functions.description: Sets a Static Mesh Attached location and rotation

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the StaticMesh set with AddStaticMeshAttached

parameters.name: relative_location
parameters.description: New relative location

parameters.name: relative_rotation
parameters.description: New relative rotation

functions.name: RemoveStaticMeshAttached
functions.description: Removes, if it exists, a StaticMesh from this Pickable given its custom ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the StaticMesh to remove

functions.name: SetDoor
functions.description: Adds a Door to the Vehicle
functions.description_long: Adds a Door at offset_location from root which will pose the Character at seat_location with seat_rotation rotation.

parameters.name: leave_lateral_offset
parameters.description: It's where the Character will be ejected when leaving it (e.g. -150 for left door or 150 for right door)

functions.name: PlayAnimation
functions.description: Plays an Animation on this Vehicle

parameters.name: loop_indefinitely
parameters.description: This parameter is only used if the Vehicle has an Animation Blueprint

parameters.name: blend_in_time
parameters.description: This parameter is only used if the Vehicle has an Animation Blueprint

parameters.name: blend_out_time
parameters.description: This parameter is only used if the Vehicle has an Animation Blueprint

parameters.name: play_rate
parameters.description: This parameter is only used if the Vehicle has an Animation Blueprint

parameters.name: stop_all_montages
parameters.description: Stops all running Montages from the same Group. This parameter is only used if the Vehicle has an Animation Blueprint

functions.name: GetBoneTransform
functions.description: Gets a Bone Transform in world space given a bone name

functions.name: GetPassenger
functions.description: Gets a passenger from a seat

return.description: or nil if no passenger in seat

functions.name: SetExplosionSettings
functions.description: Configures the Explosion Settings when health reaches zero

parameters.name: engine_relative_location
parameters.description: Relative location of the Engine. Used to apply particles and effects.

parameters.name: materials_index_burnt_override
parameters.description: List of material indexes to override to burnt when exploded. Leave it empty for all indexes.

parameters.name: materials_index_burnt_invisible
parameters.description: List of material indexes to override to invisible when exploded. Leave it empty for all indexes.

arguments.name: impact_force
arguments.description: The intensity of the Hit normalized by the Vehicle's weight

arguments.name: impact_location
arguments.description: The world 3D location of the impact

arguments.name: velocity
arguments.description: The Vehicle velocity at the moment it hits

events.name: CharacterEnter
events.description: Triggered when a Character fully enters the Vehicle

events.name: CharacterLeave
events.description: Triggered when a Character fully leaves the Vehicle

events.name: CharacterAttemptEnter
events.description: Triggered when a Character attempts to enter the Vehicle

events.name: CharacterAttemptLeave
events.description: Triggered when a Character attempts to leave the Vehicle

events.name: TakeDamage
events.description: Triggered when this Vehicle takes damage

arguments.name: from_direction
arguments.description: Direction of the damage relative to the damaged actor

arguments.name: instigator
arguments.description: The player which caused the damage

arguments.name: causer
arguments.description: The object which caused the damage

return.description: Return false to cancel the damage (will still display animations, particles and apply impact forces)
